valueSet.name: STQTERM_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT stvterm_code, stvterm_desc, stvterm_start_date, stvterm_end_date, stvterm_activity_date FROM stvterm WHERE stvterm_code >= (SELECT scbcrky_term_code_start FROM scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = :SCACRSE_SUBJ_CODE AND scbcrky_crse_numb = :SCACRSE_CRSE_NUMB ) AND stvterm_code <= (SELECT scbcrky_term_code_end FROM scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = :SCACRSE_SUBJ_CODE AND scbcrky_crse_numb = :SCACRSE_CRSE_NUMB ) ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: USCQSUBJC_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term, scbcrse_title, scbcrse_csta_code, scbcrky_term_code_start, scbcrky_term_code_end, scbcrky_activity_date FROM scbcrse, scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = nvl(:ZCBCRSE_SUBJ_CODE_XLIST, scbcrky_subj_code) AND scbcrse_subj_code = scbcrky_subj_code AND scbcrse_crse_numb = scbcrky_crse_numb AND SCBCRKY_SUBJ_CODE <> :KEY_BLOCK_KB_SUBJ_CODE ORDER BY scbcrse_subj_code, scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term

valueSet.name: USCQSUBJD_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term, scbcrse_title, scbcrse_csta_code, scbcrky_term_code_start, scbcrky_term_code_end, scbcrky_activity_date FROM scbcrse, scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = nvl(:ZCRDUPR_SUBJ_CODE, scbcrky_subj_code) AND scbcrse_subj_code = scbcrky_subj_code AND scbcrse_crse_numb = scbcrky_crse_numb ORDER BY scbcrse_subj_code, scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term

valueSet.name: SCQSUBJZ_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb, scbcrky_term_code_start, scbcrky_term_code_end, scbcrky_activity_date FROM scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = :ZCRGECO_SUBJ_CODE_COCRSE ORDER BY scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb

valueSet.name: ZGRGEAR_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT DISTINCT zgrgear_ge_version FROM zgrgear ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: SCQSUBJ_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term, scbcrse_title, scbcrse_csta_code, scbcrky_term_code_start, scbcrky_term_code_end, scbcrky_activity_date FROM scbcrse, scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = :KB_SUBJ_CODE AND scbcrse_subj_code = scbcrky_subj_code AND scbcrse_crse_numb = scbcrky_crse_numb ORDER BY scbcrse_subj_code, scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term

valueSet.name: SCQSUBJC_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT scbcrky_subj_code, scbcrky_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term, scbcrse_title, scbcrse_csta_code, scbcrky_term_code_start, scbcrky_term_code_end, scbcrky_activity_date FROM scbcrse, scbcrky WHERE scbcrky_subj_code = :KB_SUBJ_CODE AND scbcrse_subj_code = scbcrky_subj_code AND scbcrse_crse_numb = scbcrky_crse_numb ORDER BY scbcrse_subj_code, scbcrse_crse_numb, scbcrse_eff_term
